column4: how do i mount my hidden ntsf partition?  ubuntu 7.10 used to see it, but hardy doesnt
sudo fdisk -l /dev/sda2 doesnt show it. any more ideas?
sudo fdisk -l still doesmnt show my internal hdd partyition.  7.10 did.  how i fix pls?
can you pastebin the output so we can look

hrady show them all, but not the first hdd
